price: E, com efeito, concedêramos, antes, a Abraão sua retidão – e éramos, dele, Onisciente -
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā ib'rāhīma rush'dahu min qablu wakunnā bihi ʿālimīna
